Joel Maligalig it still wasn't working so I just separated out the fields... cheeky, but did the trick and is actually better in the long run. Cheers

Hi Shelly, 


Confirming this is now fixed. Instead of having one field for the 'full name' we have created a 'first name' and 'last name field' to avoid the issue and make it bullet proof. I trust this is ok with you? It also means we can easily send emails using the persons first name only to address them, e.g. Hello Heath, ...  


Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire  I cleared the cache as well
Heath Maguire  All done. Cheers!

Thanks so much Heath.




Yup big day tomorrow!




Shelly Horton


0404 868 463


shellshockedmedia.com

Hi Shelly,


Apologies, we thought this was in the checkout section, not the free video form. We will work on this first up tomorrow and send you an update.


Thanks and speak soon, and if I don’t speak to you before hand best of luck with the event!! 💪🏼

Joel Maligalig I now know what she meant. On this page, https://shellshockedmedia.com/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/ if you enter a first and last name into the free video form, the next page where we load the persons name on the page will show it like firstname + lastname. Can we remove the ‘+’? Thanks
Fwd: More changes

Heath you said all of the changes had been made but this one has not. It must have slipped through the cracks. Can you please get it done as soon as possible?




Thanks






1. Most people are using their auto-fill on the sign up email so they get a "plus" between their first and surname. "Wow Jeanine + Bribosia"




Can you please make it so either the "+" is removed or only the first name comes across. (there's a + for some reason between first and surname)






Shelly Horton

Begin forwarded message:


From: <shelly@shellyhorton.com>

Subject: More changes

Date: 8 August 2018 at 11:33:24 pm AEST

To: support@wwperk.com

Cc: "Heath Maguire" <heath@wpperk.com>, "Darren Robinson" <darren_robinson@me.com>


Hi guys,


A lot of our friends have been testing the site and this is the most common feedback. I'm hoping we can make these changes tomorrow. Please keep me updated.


1. Most people are using their auto-fill on the sign up email so they get a plus between their first and surname.

"Wow Jeanine + Bribosia"


Can you please make it so either the "+" is removed or only the first name comes across. (there's a + for some reason between first and surname)



2. Purchasing page: it asked me to sign up for the updates a second time, which I already did before starting the purchasing process? Do we need this twice?



3. Once you have purchased, I think it should say that you will receive an email with a link to access the course so you know next steps. Is this possible to add "Check your inbox for your receipt and start the course today" ?


4. On the email receipt can we please replace "View course" with "Start your course now!" And perhaps in bigger font or even green? A couple of people missed it.





Thanks


Shelly x




Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

shellshockedmedia.com
